title: Riot please read

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Ok so In the game i have attached, I got a message from 'roit games', in white text telling me to do a certain key combination in my chat, something like press enter twice then type 'fed fed', and then something would happen, can you please check chat logs and find out what this is? i figure its some kind of hack. Another member of my team received this also, but not the enemy.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is NOT an official message from Riot and you should never do anything these messages tell you.

This is an issue where a player can put their text on a new line, making it appear as if noone has sent the message (therefore people may assume it's an official announcement), this is against the EuLA and ToS and is bannable, please report players who are doing this.

The way to tell who sent the message is to look one line above the message.

hey man, wish i knew to look when that appeared, it was the master tier lux, however there is no way of reporting post-post game. Thanks though
edit just realised she had a master boarder and wasnt master. odd
